about_the_game:
• Seductive Blackjack: Trials of Temptation in a Parallel World

Welcome to Seductive Blackjack, a thrilling blackjack challenge from another world! Nine seductive dealers from different realms are waiting to go head-to-head with you. Do you consider yourself a blackjack master? Then step up and take on their challenge!

With each victory, not only will you earn rewards, but you’ll also get to see these captivating dealers gradually shed their attire and engage in deeper conversations with you. What surprises and pleasures will these interactions bring?

◉ Classic Gameplay, Easy to Learn
Enjoy the pure thrill of blackjack without complex rules, offering a straightforward and engaging experience.

◉ Nine Unique Dealers to Conquer
Each dealer has a distinct personality and background, providing a unique interactive experience with every encounter.

◉ Relaxing Atmosphere with Immersive Music
Indulge in soothing background music paired with sensual visuals for the ultimate gaming experience.

◉ Intimate Interactions and Engaging Conversations
Unlock deeper conversations with each dealer as you progress, uncovering their personal stories and hidden secrets.

Are you ready? Join this seductive and challenging blackjack game, defeat all the dealers, and experience the ultimate victory like never before!

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description:
This game contains explicit adult content and is intended for players aged 18 and above. Below is a detailed description of the mature content included:

1. Depictions of Sexual Acts
The game features sexual scenes between characters, presented through dynamic animations and CG visuals. These include explicit depictions of intimate acts, such as penetration and other consensual interactions.
These scenes are unlocked as the game progresses and are accompanied by relevant dialogues and interactions.

2. Nudity
The game includes fully nude character animations, with a gradual undressing process leading to full nudity.
This content is depicted through high-quality CG and dynamic animations, showcasing detailed representations of characters’ bodies and sexual activities.

3. Sexual Suggestions and Teasing
Players can interact with the virtual dealer through dialogues containing explicit sexual suggestions and teasing gestures.
The dealer’s actions and dialogue are designed to enhance the immersive experience for adult players.

4. Sensitive Topics Disclaimer
All sexual activities in the game are consensual interactions between characters.

The game contains depictions of light BDSM elements, such as consensual rope play. These scenes are presented in a non-violent and non-abusive context, emphasizing playful and voluntary interactions.

The game does not include any depictions of non-consensual acts, extreme violence, abuse, alcohol or drug misuse, or self-harm.
This content is created solely for adult entertainment purposes. Viewer discretion is advised.

detailed_description:
• Seductive Blackjack: Trials of Temptation in a Parallel World

Welcome to Seductive Blackjack, a thrilling blackjack challenge from another world! Nine seductive dealers from different realms are waiting to go head-to-head with you. Do you consider yourself a blackjack master? Then step up and take on their challenge!

With each victory, not only will you earn rewards, but you’ll also get to see these captivating dealers gradually shed their attire and engage in deeper conversations with you. What surprises and pleasures will these interactions bring?

◉ Classic Gameplay, Easy to Learn
Enjoy the pure thrill of blackjack without complex rules, offering a straightforward and engaging experience.

◉ Nine Unique Dealers to Conquer
Each dealer has a distinct personality and background, providing a unique interactive experience with every encounter.

◉ Relaxing Atmosphere with Immersive Music
Indulge in soothing background music paired with sensual visuals for the ultimate gaming experience.

◉ Intimate Interactions and Engaging Conversations
Unlock deeper conversations with each dealer as you progress, uncovering their personal stories and hidden secrets.

Are you ready? Join this seductive and challenging blackjack game, defeat all the dealers, and experience the ultimate victory like never before!
name: SeductiveBlackjack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

agcom.descriptors:
**Content Description:**
This game contains explicit depictions of nudity, sexual acts, and sexually suggestive content, intended for an adult audience (18+). The gameplay involves Blackjack 21 matches against virtual dealers. As players accumulate points, the dealer gradually removes clothing until fully nude. Upon defeating the dealer, players unlock a short animated scene depicting consensual sexual acts, which includes dynamic visuals, sound effects, and full nudity.

**Sensitive Topics:**
- All sexual scenes in this game are consensual and do not involve themes of non-consensual acts or sexual violence.
- The game includes adult-oriented dialogue, nudity, and sexual scenarios, which may be sensitive for some players.
- BDSM or other power dynamics are not a feature of this game. Viewer discretion is advised.

**Interactive Elements:**
- Player interactions involve dialogues and visual sequences of the dealer undressing during gameplay.
- After a match, players may choose to view a sexual animation sequence, which is skippable and does not affect gameplay progression.
- The sexual animations are detailed, featuring explicit visuals of consensual intercourse, accompanied by sound effects and dynamic movements.

This content is strictly suitable for mature players (18+) and should be approached with discretion.

short_description: Game Features: ◉ Classic Gameplay, Easy to Pick Up Enjoy the pure thrill of blackjack without complicated rules. ◉ Nine Unique Dealers to Conquer Each dealer has a distinct personality and background, offering a completely different interactive experience.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
